description: TBS Job Evaluation Standards per occupational group with evaluation factors, points, and level descriptions

og_code.description: Primary key - TBS occupational group code (FK to dim_og)

og_subgroup_code.description: Subgroup code if standard is subgroup-specific

standard_name.description: Name of the classification or evaluation standard (e.g., 'Information Technology Job Evaluation Standard')

factor_description.description: Description of what this evaluation factor measures

factor_points.description: Maximum point value for this factor (where available)

factor_percentage.description: Percentage of total points for this factor (e.g., 30.0 for 30%)

level_points.description: Point value for this specific level/degree

level_description.description: Description of what this level entails

full_text.description: Complete text content for full-text search

_source_url.description: Per-record URL to authoritative TBS page

_scraped_at.description: ISO timestamp when data was scraped from TBS

_ingested_at.description: ISO timestamp when data was ingested to gold layer

_batch_id.description: Unique batch identifier for this ingestion run

relationships.description: Links evaluation standards to occupational groups

usage_hints: Filter by standard_type='evaluation_factor' to get individual factors with points
Filter by standard_type='classification_standard' to get standard overview records
Use factor_points and factor_percentage for classification level determination
Use full_text for full-text search queries
Join to dim_og using og_code for occupational group context

sample_queries.description: Get all evaluation factors for IT group
sample_queries.sql: SELECT factor_name, factor_points, factor_percentage FROM dim_og_job_evaluation_standard WHERE og_code = 'IT' AND standard_type = 'evaluation_factor'

sample_queries.description: Find standards with highest factor point values
sample_queries.sql: SELECT og_code, factor_name, factor_points FROM dim_og_job_evaluation_standard WHERE factor_points IS NOT NULL ORDER BY factor_points DESC LIMIT 10
